Package cs2030.simulator

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Simulator
  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for discrete event simulation. Simulates Customers arriving and being served by Servers.

    • Method Detail

      • findServer

        public Server findServer​(double currentTime)
        Finds the first available Server that can serve a Customer at the current time.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current time.
        Returns:
        first available Server, null if all are unavailable.

      • serve

        public double[] serve​(int count,
                      int limit,
                      java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> pq,
                      int seed,
                      double lambda,
                      double mu,
                      double rho,
                      double prob,
                      double greedyProb)
        Simulate the flow of Events when Customers arrive and add all Events to PriorityQueue.
        Parameters:
        count - Number of Customers to be served.
        limit - Maximum queue length.
        pq - PriorityQueue of Events.
        seed - Seed for RandomGenerator object.
        lambda - Arrival rate.
        mu - Service rate.
        rho - Resting rate.
        prob - Resting probability.
        greedyProb - Probability of encountering a greedy Customer.
        Returns:
        double Array which stores the number of Customers who left and total waiting time.
